DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor predict well patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This research study study biomarkers tissue sample patient recurrent metastatic head neck cancer treat ECOG-E1395 ECOG-E3301 .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Tissue Samples From Patients With Recurrent Metastatic Head Neck Cancer Treated ECOG-E1395 ECOG-E3301
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To investigate association biomarkers ( HPV tumor status ERCC1 expression ) clinical outcome population patient recurrent metastatic head neck cancer . - To develop ability select patient likely respond therapy avoid treatment ineffective therapy , especially since therapy substantial toxicity . - To estimate response survival rate HPV-negative -positive patient study . ( exploratory ) OUTLINE : Tumor HPV status determine situ hybridization ( ISH ) sample also undergo immunostaining p16 . ERCC1 expression evaluate AQUA , quantitative IHC analysis . Samples classify two category base biomarker status : HPV tumor status ( negative versus positive ) , ERCC1 expression level ( low versus high ) .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Tissue specimens patient recurrent metastatic head neck cancer treat ECOGE1395 ECOGE3301 Stage III , IV , recurrent disease Squamous cell disease Any follow diagnosis : Lip oral cavity Oropharynx Hypopharynx Larynx Paranasal sinus nasal cavity Squamous neck cancer Salivary gland PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
